###Introducing medals

Please take a look at the medals tutorial [here](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/JMMaronge/medals/blob/master/inst/doc/medals_vignette.html)

Alternatively you can...

```{r,echo=TRUE,eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("jmmaronge/medals")
library(medals)
vignette(topic="medals_vignette",package="medals")
```
